Comment: A unique identifier for the Debtor Contact. The identifier for the Contact record is specified by the CONTACT_SEQNO field.
The account number of the Debtor account that the Contact is associated with.
This field is set to 'Y' if the Contact is set as the default Contact for the Debtor account.
